sentences.en: A whirlpool is formed by water going round very fast.
sentences.cn: 漩涡是由不断快速旋转的水形成的.

sentences.en: EB: Sir, full power into the core of the whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 海尔兄; 爷爷, 开足马力,让船冲入最大的旋涡.

sentences.en: Hung - chien's emotions were like a whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 鸿 渐 情感像个漩涡.

sentences.en: people who are caught in a whirlpool of grief
sentences.cn: 沉浸在极度悲伤中的人们

sentences.en: She became caught in a whirlpool of hate.
She felt she was being dragged into a whirlpool of emotion.
sentences.cn: 她觉得自己被卷入了感情的旋涡。

sentences.en: The boat was sucked down into the whirlpool.
The canoe was sucked ( down ) into the whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 那独木舟 卷进 漩涡里了.

sentences.en: The canoe was sucked into the whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 那独木舟被卷进了漩涡.

sentences.en: The recent rain had churned up the waterfall into a muddy whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 最近的一场雨把瀑布搅成了泥水漩涡。

sentences.en: The whirlpool sucked down everything floating on the water.
sentences.cn: 漩涡把水面上漂的东西都吸进去了.

sentences.en: The whirlpool sucked down the boat.
The whirlpool sucked down the canoe.
sentences.cn: 漩涡把独木舟卷了进去.

sentences.en: The whirlpool sucked in the boat.
Then, suddenly, he could not swim. He was caught in a whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 接着他突然游不动了, 他被卷进了旋涡里.

sentences.en: Whirlpool shares added 65 cents to $ 49.81 in morning trading.
sentences.cn: 惠而浦股票今天早晨上升了65美分,至49.81美元.

words.tran_cn: 旋转；眩晕；卷走；疾走（whirl的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: a powerful current of water that spins around and can pull things down into it
